name: Glimmeran
description:
Guarded Ingenuity
The Glimmeran are a gnomish culture that takes great pride in their tinkering with both magic and machines. They value expertise, clever engineering, and polite merchant dealings.

options.name: Reaction: Ingenious Escape
options.description: When targeted by an attack, you can activate a small mechanical device to create a flash of light and smoke, imposing disadvantage on the attack.

options.name: Merchant's Touch
options.description: Gain +1 Persuasion and you always know the fair market value of any item you examine.

options.name: Tinker's Pride
options.description: Gain +1 Engineering and items you craft have one additional modification slot.
